introduction: Umhlolwa kulindzeleke kutsi achaze kutsi yini lokushiwo yinkondlo nobe umcondvo losebaleni wenkondlo.

points: Sonkondlo ukhuluma ngemphucuko leyente bantfu balahla inchubo yesintfu yekwelapha.
Sonkondlo ubuta kutsi baphi belaphi lebebalapha ngesintfu: baphenguli, bafembi netingedla.
Sonkondlo ubuta ngenchubo yakudzala yekwelapha njengekubhunyisa tinyamatane, kucashwe emadzengelo kubuye kuphekwe netimbita.
Sonkondlo ubuta kutsi umkhuhlane awenteni nyalo ngobe bekasebentisa emacembe nemagcolo etihlahla kwelapha umkhuhlane.
Sonkondlo ukhuluma nangengculazi langayati kutsi utayelapha ngani lomuhla ngenca yemphucuko.

conclusion: Bahlolwa basonga konkhe lababhale ngako lapha ngenhla, lapho bacoca khona ngemcondvo losebaleni lotfolakala kulenkondlo lengenhla.

introduction: Bahlolwa bachaza kutsi luyini ludvweshu futsi basho nekutsi kunetinhlobo letimbili teludvweshu; ludvweshu lwangekhatsi neludvweshu lwangaphandle.

points: Kungabuyi kwaLushawulo ekhaya kwabanga ludvweshu lwangekhatsi kuLaMagagula.

model_answers: Somnjalose ungumake wenkhosi Somhlolo ngobe umbita ngekutsi ndvodzana
Utsi Somnjalose uyihlo wakushiya kimi sisekaLobamba wekucala.
Sigameko sekufuna kucitfwa kwenkhosi Somhlolo esihlalweni sebukhosi
Sigameko sekutsi emakhosi lamanye afuna kususa imphi.
Liveta sibekandzaba sendzawo yasemakhaya ngoba emajaha asalala elawini.
Lenchubo yaletsa kuthula kwaba nekuvana emkhatsini wemabutfo akaNdvungunya newakaZwide.
Lenkhulumo iveta Somnjalose angumelekeleli ngobe weluleka indvodzana yakhe abuye ayelekelele kutsi kumele isibuse njani sive sayo.
Kunenkhulumiswano/Kunebadlali, lokutimphawu temdlalo.
Kufuna kwati kutsi ingabe batawuya yini kuyokhulumisana nenkhosi
Ingabe lokungavisisani kwaletigodzi letimbili kwagcina ngani
Ingabe waya yini kuyewufuna lesihlobo nobe wasitfola yini?
Uyiphumelelise ngekutsi angahambisani nendlela lebusa ngayo inkhosi Somhlolo lokwente kutsi kube nembango webukhosi.
Lesento sibafundzisa kutsi umholi lohlakaniphile uyaticela teluleko kulabadzala
Teluleko tebatali tiyewuhlala tibalulekile nobe sewungumholi.
Itfumela imilayeto yekutsi uma ubekwe esikhundleni kumele wesekele umholi wakho ungaphikisani naye
Kuhlonipha umholi wakho umsebentele ngekwetsembeka.

Labavumako batawesekela ngekutsi: Abebukene nebumatima bekuvukelwa nguletinye tindvuna njengaMahubhulu/Abehlaselwa khona lapha esiveni sakhe kunekutsi ahlaselwa khashane/Lamanye emakhosi lakhelene nawo afuna kuhlasela.
Labangavumi batawesekela ngemaphuzu abo lanembako.
Ubonisa indvodzana yakhe Somhlolo.
Uneliso lelicaphelako.
Uyamnakekela nobe asakhulule.
Uyamecwayisa kutsi angabi netitsa.
